name: BtsSiteMgr
description: GSM Base Transceiver Station (BTS) resource specification

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: id
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Used as an RDN when naming an instance of the object class.

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: userLabel
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: A user-friendly (and user assignable) name of this object

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: vnfParametersList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Parameter set of the VNF instance(s)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: latitude
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Latitude of the site manager location based on (WGS 84) global reference frame

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: longitude
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Longitude of the site manager location based on (WGS 84) global reference frame

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: operationalState
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Indicates the operational state of the object instance (ITU-T X.731)
